title: Canyonlands National Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be a Junior Ranger            There are a few ways to become a Junior Ranger at Canyonlands. Free Junior Ranger booklets are available at park visitor centers, or they may be downloaded below. Filled with fun activities, these books reveal the wonders of Canyonlands to kids and parents alike. After completing certain exercises, participants earn a Junior Ranger badge and signed certificate. Activities are designed for ages 5 and up.  Â    At the Island in the Sky, you may also earn a badge for completing three activities from the Explorer Pack. Download Junior Ranger Booklet [4mb PDF File]
